Congratulations, {{recipient.firstName}}! You're coming to QHacks 2018!

Congratulations, {{recipient.firstName}}!

We're so excited to invite you to attend QHacks 2018! This year's applicant pool was the best yet, making our decision-making process harder than ever. Now it's time to get you ready to come to Queen's on Feb. 2-4. Here's what we need from you:

  1. RSVP on the QHacks Dashboard by no later than Wednesday, January 24th at 11:59 PM EST. We need you to confirm that you'll be attending and need some more information about you to make QHacks as awesome as possible!
  2. Join the QHacks 2018 Slack. This will be our main method of communication during the event, so make sure to download the Slack mobile app to your phone too!
  3. Share that you're coming to QHacks 2018 on Twitter with #QHacks.

Travel

If you are coming from Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, or Waterloo, we will be having buses going to Kingston from each of those cities. Spots on those buses will be filled on a first-come-first-serve basis based on RSVP time, so get that RSVP in ASAP! You also need to email travel@qhacks.io telling us that you would like to be on the bus for your city.

If you are interested in being a bus coordinator for your city, please email travel@qhacks.io.

If you are travelling to QHacks from another location than the ones listed above, we will be offering travel reimbursements. Please email travel@qhacks.io for more information.

Other Stuff You Probably Want To Know

  • Registration and dinner will run from 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM on Friday, February 2nd. A full schedule will be released in the coming days.
  • Teams are allowed to be groups of 1 to 4 people.
  • You have 36 hours to build whatever you desire.
  • You're going to have a blast!

Given the sheer number of hacker applications, we ask that if you can no longer attend, please withdraw your application on the QHacks Dashboard so you give someone on the waitlist the opportunity to attend.

RSVP NOW

In the meantime, stay tuned on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for announcements about cool events and prizes. If you have any questions, you can reply directly to this email or email hello@qhacks.io. We can't wait to see what you create at QHacks 2018!

See you soon,

The QHacks Team
